name: matFlow.dark [WorkFlowy]
description:
matFlow is a dark theme for the WorkFlowy web app. It started initially as a few tweaks locally and ended up turning into a full-blown theme. It has a flat clean design that enables your eyes to relax and focus on what is important; sex, drugs and EDM. There are a ton of bugs.

DISCLAIMER
WorkFlowy offers a paid upgrade. I think you should support them as Pro gives you much more than just themes. This style does NOT give you access to any of the Pro features. It is just CSS.
additional_info: VERSION 3.0 OUT NOW This is a major update. Many elements have been completely re-worked including the selected node styling and layout, logo, icons, starred items, link styling, modal boxes, keyboard shortcuts, search, tags and more. Some minor animations have been added as well as svg icons for most elements. As a little treat, I've also re-styled the loading page animation to fit the theme. There are still a few issues that will be addressed in the next minor release. NOTE I had styled the blog as well, and all was working fine until workflowy completely changed their theme. So the blog is currently pretty jacked up. Bugs will be fixed on the next minor release. VIEW CHANGELOG You can view more details and screenshots at the GitHub Repository. If you come across any bugs, please post them in the matFlow Issues area of the repo. Thanks for checking out my style! If it makes you happy, makes your browsing experience easier, or you just are feeling generous, please feel free to send me a donation via the link below. I am a struggling developer and every little bit helps, even if it's only 50 cents! THANK YOU and ENJOY.
